newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Transaero launches CIS discounts from Sept 15.
newsitem.headline: Transaero launches CIS discounts from Sept 15.

text.p: Private Russian carrier Transaero announced on Monday discounts on all its regular flights in the former Soviet Union from September 15.
"We will offer 25 percent discounts for all passengers in economy class who are older than 60," a company spokeswoman Natalya Alexashina told Reuters.
She said Transaero would also offer discounts of 50 percent for tickets for families of more than three persons.
Transaero flies to 20 destinations in the former Soviet Union, and seven other international destinations.
The airline has started five new international and domestic regular routes during this year.
